website_summaries.verdict: While it has a lot of features for amateurs, similar kits we considered offer better quality and value.
pros: Built for novices and hobbyists, as it has components that are useful for making social media videos and basic still photography
cons: Owners gripe about the durability of some of the equipment, including flimsy clips, broken pieces, and lighting that seemed dimmer than 800 watts

customer_reviews.title: Truly Awful
customer_reviews.text: The lights only stay on for about 1 minute, the backdrop doesn't fit, and the hardware is cheaply made / doesn't fit properly. I can't believe this is an "Amazon's Choice" item. It was truly a pain to repack immediately after setting it up and discovering the lights don't work and the "backdrop" is a wrinkly sheet that's too small for the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect package setup for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a photographer nor am I aspiring. I bought this so I can take pictures of my daughters at home. I don’t really know anything about how this equipment should be used so I am winging it. I love the extra light it brings into my photos. The backgrounds are cloth so be aware they will need to be steamed. Comes with lightbulbs and everything you could need as far as I am concerned. I have put this together 2 times and used my iPhone 8 to take a couple practice photos instead of breaking out the DSLR. I am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS. ALMOST DIED.
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in one of the lights to my outlet and the WIRE EXPLODED. Volts fired from the wall outlet, and if I held the wire while I switched on the bulb, I would have positively DIED or have been SERIOUSLY INJURED. I was inches away from the wire when it gave out. Seriously. Why did this happen? I want a new part for the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R.

customer_reviews.title: It was kind of a lie
customer_reviews.text: I feel kinda lied to! I guess it's a good started kit but still not what was discribed. The back drops are not 6x10 and the bulbs are not 800watt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Everything came packaged neatly and all materials ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything came packaged neatly and all materials were inside! Only thing is I wish the backdrop stand was a little taller... other than that I loveeee it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase Neewer products, they don't stand behind them.
customer_reviews.text: One fourth of the lighting do not work. Neewer asked for a video to see why I contacted them. They advised that they were unable to replace the bad lighting fixture and bulb. They have not offered a refund, or adjustment. I am planning to purchase more photography equipment but I will not be buying anything from Neewer again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon_S

customer_reviews.title: A clamp broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went to use this, one of the clamps broke. It did not just break, the pieces flew. That really freaked me out. I love to photograph babies and this set-up is the perfect size but the idea of it breaking around a baby scares me. I have had luck with the lights but please be careful with the clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price of admission
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit. While all the components together can be quite heavy at times...setup is quite easy. This is not some hardcore setup meant for intense conditions, wind etc. For use indoors its quite sufficient and I had no issues with any of the components. I can get several lights and the backdrop all setup within 15 minutes now. Easy to put up, easy to take down. For a starter kit I don't think you can go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Lights damage the stands when attaching
customer_reviews.text: This item came damaged. Poor quality. Lights damage the stands when attaching, rickety, loose screws, etc. The bag came with numerous holes and ripped stitches and unsewable seams, some clamps came damaged. The umbrella units dent when attached to the lights, any tightening seems to damage the product...
customer_reviews.author: William Velez

customer_reviews.title: So Much Stuff for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't believe the amount of stuff that you get for the money. I ordered this after reading multiple reviews and I am completely satisfied with this product. It looks like everything will last quite a while. I'm not sure how durable it will be if you're constantly assembling/dis-assembling for portable / remote shooting use. But I will pretty much leave this in one place most of the time, and I think it will last a very long time that way. I even took a chance and ordered a "damaged" package from Amazon at a discount and NOTHING was wrong with the product inside. Extremely pleased with Neewer products and the Amazon discount as well.
customer_reviews.author: billbrusky

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to finally get my green screen, the stand for it was broken in multiple places and was not due to shipping I was clearly sent defective item returning :(
customer_reviews.author: gercaro

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!! Backdrop measurements are not as specified... they are 5.5'x9'
customer_reviews.text: Came with broken lightbox (socket did not work with any bulbs). Backdrops are NOT 8.5'x10'... they are 5.5'×9'!!! I ordered this kit for the backdrops specifically because of the size details... wth!?
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Lights flicker
customer_reviews.text: So this has some great stuff I’m in it and some of it is awesome ! Some , not so much . The lights won’t stay on for longer than fight minutes , then they flicker and shut off . Had to re -record an entire set due to lighting issues . Other than that it’s pretty nice .
customer_reviews.author: Bran18

customer_reviews.title: Good for the $ but know what your getting
customer_reviews.text: Good for the $ You get what you pay for in quality and this was a decent value. I did not have big quality expectations, so was not disappointed. Pros Good for a starter kit Cons Not wide enough - had to landscape it but then limits to not a full body shot Could use a little more lighting: lumens and/or more lights
customer_reviews.author: EasyIT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at Photo Backdrop kits for a long time before actually making a purchase and I finally chose this one. I love it!! I now can take pictures of the grandchildren any time I want and so far I have gotten some beautiful photos. This kit was easy to set up and use. I did it all by myself. The price is exceptional for all the pieces you get.
customer_reviews.author: WDC

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Lighting Set for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an unbelievable value for the money. You get a great variety of lighting and backgrounds for either photographs or video. I used the softbox lighting for a video I was making. It was just the lighting I needed. Will be looking at using the green sheet in the near future. Everything comes in nylon cases for easy transportation. Easy to setup and use. Easy to take down and store in the cases. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for my needs. I have this set up in my office and it works out great for us. It isn't used for professional photography, only for video reviews and live broadcasts. People who complain about the backdrops being wrinkled are lazy. Use a steamer on it and the wrinkles fall out. Anything that is folded will have creases people - if you don't have a steamer, than iron it but stop writing poor reviews because you couldn't take the time to iron it.
customer_reviews.author: D Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome photo set! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do a newborn photoshoot during quarantine and I couldn't have been happier! It comes with everything you need to ensure you have perfect lighting to take portrait pictures. The backdrops are also well made and just need to be ironed. The lights are bright and easy to assemble and move. Would highly recommend, this set is a bit more than some others but well worth the money. You wont regret buying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great starter set  if the product didn’t arrive damaged.
customer_reviews.text: One of the stands has a leg bent. Found out a couple weeks after it arrived that one of the softboxes was partially collapsed due to a broken “limb” inside as well. I didn’t notice because I’ve only needed one for my shoots so far. Planning to return this if the manufacturer or seller can’t replace the two broken pieces. If they do, I hope the kit isn’t altogether fragile. -1 star for build quality, -1 star for quality control and -1 star for my pending frustration with either returning this or finding a way to get replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Package came half broken or incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thinking it would be great. The photos on listing are a bit different. They make it seem big and great. But when you get it .. everything seems to fall apart as you put it together. It's not as sturdy ... One of my supports for the green screen cloth came broken so I can't even use it.. I was missing few clamps .... I tried calling the manufacturer and no response .. ill be returning this .. It's def not worth $200 at this point .. maybe $120.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi patel

customer_reviews.title: Full Kit
customer_reviews.text: I know for the price I'm not going to be getting anything really nice, so I kept my expectations low, and they were about right. The quality of the materials is quite poor, stands are wobbly, cloth is like tissue paper. But this isn't a professional set, so understand that before buying. I took a star off because tripod parts arrived broken (no damage to package) from the factory. I epoxied them back together and it's holding.
customer_reviews.author: MuNaught

customer_reviews.title: It was an okay product. The screen came with ...
customer_reviews.text: It was an okay product. The screen came with lots of holes. Reached out to the vendor but no response. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Im going to keep it see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok for starting out as you first lighting set and back drop . Only bad thing is its very delicate flimsy and could break at any moment so Im very gentle with it. Also all the clips that came but 3 of the clips that came with it came broken . I had to go out and buy some as soon as it came in because the back drop i had needed a few more clips to hold it up correctly . I wish it was a little less delicate so i could have more confidence with the product .
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Garcia jr

customer_reviews.title: Tripods both broke about 2 minutes apart...broke as I tried to extend them?
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with everything - until I put up the backdrop. Both support legs of the backdrop pole SNAPPED upon extension?? Both of them. I am so disappointed! I haven't used the backdrop (obviously) because the tripods both broke. The rest of the items are fine., a great beginner setup. I will need to purchase a reflector and some lower intensity bulbs for my space, but it's not a terrible beginner setup. Not sure what to do about the 2 broken tripods...
customer_reviews.author: Dawson Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great kit overall!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Everything is packaged nice, easy to set up, and just as shown. The reason for the 4 stars. 1. The back drops are thin. The green and white backdrops are noticeable in some areas. 2. While easy to package up...The carrying bag is poorly made. It had a ripped corner upon taking it out the box. Over all I’m glad I made the purchase, and I love the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Tripods do not hold weight of umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Tripods are thin and do not hold the weight of the black umbrellas. No instructions were included.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect much honestly, glad I was wrong..
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat this background system and lights. Everything about it is well made. The material is all good, assembly was easy as ever, and the lights work perfectly. Didn't expect much from this, but happy to say it blew me a way!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not great for Beginning Youtube Career
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Neewer Backdrop to start my YouTube Channel. One of the umbrella's came without packaging and it will not stay in designated spot. The screw used to fasten the umbrella just turns and doesn't hold the umbrella in place at all. One of the clips for the backdrop came broken as well. besides those things.the Neewer set up is pretty simple to put together. Took me about 45 mins to assemble everything myself. for reference. I am 5'7 145lbs,
customer_reviews.author: Júelz Lōrén

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The lights really are not very bright at all. I will probably buy different light bulbs than what came with it. In hind site I think I would have been happier buying a stand for backdrops and 1 nice light instead of this set. There is nothing special about the backdrops and they are all semitransparent. I would not really recommend it, but not worth sending back as I can use it now that I have it, but I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: dillard

customer_reviews.title: The photos are just like professionals do it.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter didn’t have a whole lot of money to spend on photography equipment. So I bought this off of Amazon and since she is a amateur photographer at the moment it really helps out and does exactly what she needed. The photos are amazing and it gives her great detail and the instructions on how to professionals do it.
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: Great Setup
customer_reviews.text: I really like this setup. It is easy to set up and take down. It is light weight. It was more than I excepted it to be. Great price for what it is. I would recommend this if you're just beginning. The backdrop stand is adjustable. It can go really wide or small enough to fit in my apartment. The lights were bright. Everything was neatly packaged and protected. The backdrops were nice but a bit see through unless you put against a wall. Overall this was a good find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights, hate the backdrops though.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, the only issue is that everything comes extremely wrinkled, and they are absolutely impossible to keep unwrinkled! I've created some awesome work.with these! The lights are perfect for what I do in my studio!
customer_reviews.author: Noah G

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised in solid packaging. No broken bulbs and the equipment is very sturdy and high quality. I bought four mounts that can be found installed on top of the tripods for the continuous lighting that will also allow me to utilize flash lighting for this kit as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid but Amazon refurbished...
customer_reviews.text: Came in with broken tripods, missing umbrella, and broken lightbulbs! Totally bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sacul

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. The 3 color backdrops allow you to accommodate a wide range of costume colors and actor skin tones. The stands and lights are easy to assemble and use and cover a wide range of heights and angles. All you need is a good power strip and you're set!
customer_reviews.author: Paul McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a professional for photography so I can’t answer that question but I bought it for home videos nothing pro but that’s what I needed to start my YouTube video great for beginners it took me time to assembled by my self but it is not difficult
customer_reviews.author: muñeca

customer_reviews.title: Works Well But Better Equipment Is Available
customer_reviews.text: Our company outsourced our photoshoots and sit-down interviews to different marketing companies in the past. With this system, we were able to cut those costs while keeping a high level of professionalism for our photoshoots and interviews. Some observations from multiple uses: Assembly is easy but can be annoying. You will need a steamer to remove any creases/lines from the backdrops. The lighting equipment is bright (white light), but there is no intensity control.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cranford

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: I only half opened it before I saw the quality and returned it immediately. The back drop bar was shotty and will probably fall on someones head. the lights were good lights on terrible stands the set up was cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Used/Broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged with a footprint. Tried contacting customer service but no response other than an invalid email address to email proof to. Tried to call back for another email, no answer. Nice set and easy to assemble but returning it due to damaged soft box.
customer_reviews.author: Brushworks by Dima

customer_reviews.title: decent product
customer_reviews.text: Besides the backdrops, everything packs up well. Not like trying to fit a tent back in the bag that it some how came in when you bought it originally. 2 of the light sockets, have a very cheap feel when screwing in the light bulbs. All in all it gets the job done for the majority of things the average person would use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Great setup. Comes with a nice set of bags to carry and protect everything. My only complaint is that the stands for the backdrops bend and sag a bit when fully extended and raised. I would recommend getting small sandbags to help hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Be

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCTS !!️
customer_reviews.text: BEEN ORDERED & RECEIVED PRODUCT ON TIME .EVERYTHING WAS INSIDE. MY ONLY DISAPPOINTMENT WAS ONCE I OPEN THE BOX I NOTICE 1 STAND WAS DAMAGED/ CHIPPED. WHICH NOW CAUSE THE STAND TO WOBBLE BECAUSE ITS NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.author: JAZZEE B

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well manufactured product and appears to be sturdy. I have used it numerous times already and with the small amount of investment, I can say that is a good buy. It is easy to set up and take down because the packaging fits it all back in perfectly. What I noticed right away that although it is a cheaper fabric, it still does not wrinkle as bad as others.
customer_reviews.author: Gioiamaro

customer_reviews.title: Great for producing quality portraits
customer_reviews.text: This is a good setup for portraits if you have the space! My only complaint is that the backdrops are a little too thin, and you can see through them when the lights are on. I fixed that problem by layering the backdrop over a bedsheet though, and then it was great. I used this setup to take some pictures of myself, and my friends thought I had them professionally done! Oh, and I also found that this setup is really good for taking pictures of shoes if anybody is into that.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran wright

customer_reviews.title: dead lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: Most of the equipment seems fine but 3 of the light bulbs died very quickly within a few minutes. We didn't even finish recording a short 3-minute video. Had to order replacement bulbs which were a little pricey. We will see how it goes after the replacement bulbs arrive. I wish we could get a reimbursement for the defective bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Feng

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a first tj
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. First time user of this type of lighting kit but kit came organized in packaging and was easy to assemble and use. Only complaint was that the bulbs in kit could be brighter. Wilk be looking into purchasing brighter bulbs. Otherwise, looking at videos to learn lighting tricks etc . Attached picture of accessory but as can see still need to continue learning but definitely believe bulbs in kit could have been brighter. But a good buy for a first time user. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: richard johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived and it was so easy to assemble. I tested it out and the lighting was perfect and just what I was looking for. I'm an amateur photographer and this is great. I love that I can take it with me anywhere. Definitely recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic service! One of the equipment bags arrived with ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic service! One of the equipment bags arrived with a hole poked through due to shipping (although not one of the light bulbs was broken). The package contained a card with someone to contact regarding any problems. I wrote an email about the torn bag and received an immediate response. My replacement bag just arrived and it is awesome! All of the products are as advertised. I will do business with Neewer again in the future, and look forward to their service and products.
customer_reviews.author: Sw

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I am quite surprised with the build quality of the stands. Obviously, the lights could be more powerful but the description does not overstate the lighting capabilities at all. For the money, this is a very decent set of stands and the lights can always be upgraded in the future when money and needs change. Overall, I think this is an extremely good beginner set of lighting, especially for the price. The packaging was great and noth the cases are more than sufficient for storage and transporting the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy4130

customer_reviews.title: Great for my studio.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first photography equipment I have purchased. I like the ease of set up, and the backdrops are nice and I was happy it came with a green screen so I could shoot videos and transparencies to place subjects in a different scene. I have not gotten the chance to use the green screen yet, but I will say that you should wash, dry, and iron them before you try and use them. They come folded and will have heavy creases in them that will show up on camera.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rader

customer_reviews.title: Good value !!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ! I bought for my granddaughter to use. It’s easy to set up and take down. Fits in two bags so it doesn’t take up space. It’s packed up well enough to make it easy to take any where you go. Not heavy !!
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Basic colors of backdrops thought
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Basic colors of backdrops thought. You might want other colors. The supports (the stuff that holds the softbox or the stand) the screw is week. It easily compresses back even when tightened strongly (I'm talking about the 3 point stand, that are that the legs are 3 which you expand) and the metal is very week. But I still liked it because it was cheap for beginners and very suitable. The light bulbs as well. Didn't like the watts. It was about 60 45w light bulb and it just wasn't enough so I ordered a 105w light bulb. Overall. I recommend it for beginners. This review shouldn't chase you away :)
customer_reviews.author: Nwanisobi Chiemelie

customer_reviews.title: A great starter set, backdrops shorter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what I expected, but I definitely got more than that with this kit. I'm a beginner in the pro world of photography, and this was a perfect start. The backdrops are much shorter than the picture seems, when they're raised to human height you have maybe a foot and a half leftover on the ground, maybe two feet. Came with enough lightbulbs for all the equipment, I think I only got five clamps though. All in all, a great starter set on a budget. Highly recommend picking up a tripod with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Calli

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. easy to put together. All poles are adjustable. The only problem is the tripod legs need to be a little heavier because if you are shooting a flat lay item and have fixture part facing down they will tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: It's initially a nice set for the money but none of the lights work... they all blew out within 10 minutes of my session! Every. Single. One. I was mortified!! Now I have to get all new lights so I pretty much paid $170 for 3 backdrops and a stand.
customer_reviews.author: bbab15

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, wish the back drop was wider. Everything is sturdy enough for kids, and family pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Great for youtube and Live streaming
customer_reviews.text: I use the 2 umbrella lights and the green screen for creating both youtube content and for live streaming and they work perfectly! The green screen can be as tall as you like and can be shortened down as a simpler back drop for live streaming sessions. Materials are good quality and I would recommend this product for sure for those on searching for a green screen and lighting combo!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first studio I purchased for my photography business. It helped me learn a lot about lighting and taking portraits in a studio. The stand is too large for the provided backdrops. and finally the last complaint is that the lights can make the room extremely hot to shoot in. 10/10 recommend for the price. just be wary of the issues I came across.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeLesDernier

customer_reviews.title: The light stand can't hold up the light box and umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It's a very comprehensive kit, it has almost all the equipment for a starter. However, the light stands do not hold up the light boxes and the umbrellas, with is really sad, hence the one star. You get what you paid for. I will have to return my purchase and make photo studio shopping list according to the items given in this kit, and buy the better quality ones that actually hold up. I would suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Baobao

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Lamp Holder Screws
customer_reviews.text: I received this item today and everything set up really nice except the lamp holders for the umbrella lights. Whenever I put the holder on the light stand and tried to screw it to tighten it, the screw wouldn’t tighten and constantly fall out. I was trying to screw it for over an hour and no luck. Everything else is set up perfectly fine. If anybody has any advice on how to fix this issue with the umbrella lamp holder/light stand set up, please help.
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, quality products.
customer_reviews.text: This set is a killer deal. I use these lights for my home studio or to help add extra light for shots around my home for my blog. Easy to adjust and I like the variety of screens/lights. The only down side is the canvas is a little short so I ended up buying a longer one so I could raise the poles higher. Overall a killer deal!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Get it. Just get it.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it arrived the day after I ordered it! What?? There's a lot to this pack, and it's a lot to set up the first time, but not terrible at all. The lights are bright and strong and the backdrops are perfect. Very, very pleased with this entire set. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: shannon kuratli

customer_reviews.title: poor quality light
customer_reviews.text: The light was not white at all, very blue shifted. the muslin was quite thin. Amateur quality at best, really like an expensive toy. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set and I definitely accomplished what I was trying to do.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy f.

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just started getting into portrait shots in my garage. I was using my ring light for everything before, and one of my besties recomended this to me. I decided to purchase it and could not be more happy. It literaly comes with everything you need to start out. I will say the claps are a little bit on the flimsy side, but other than that, this works great for an at home studio build. Pleased with this product and would definately recomend to other people looking to start up a studio at home.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Love it all!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. I’ve used it for photoshoots, green screen and even made it into a photobooth wall one time. Had it for a couple years now and would still recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke curtis

customer_reviews.title: The lights work nicely, and the back drops are cloth
customer_reviews.text: The box came all smashed up, and missing 3 of the clamps, because the clamps were not packaged with the other gear inside the Tote bags. The lights work nicely, and the back drops are cloth, and are what I expected for the price. Overall decent purchase, but annoyed the clamps were loose and missing when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: AdamlWalton

customer_reviews.title: Not the best set up or quality
customer_reviews.text: Backdrop is cheap, one tripod broken, nice lights. Quality is ok but not what we hoped for. I guess will see how the rest of the tripods hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my portraits.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. great price for everything that comes with it and super great quality. Takes a minute to set up but overall sturdy and great! I took the photo above with the umbrella lights, not the soft lights but I do love the soft lights for baby photos.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a killer deal! Super easy set up if you're hooking up everything by yourself. Nothing feels cheap about this set. The backdrops are quality fabric, true to their color and the green screen has amazing projection performance. Wrinkles came out easy. The stand is tall and wide and stays supported even when I'm adjusting the tripod heights. The extra clamps are really good for the drops from sliding all over the place and helps keep them hung flat so they won't crinkle. Comes with all the lighting you need, the soft boxes and umbrellas give off natural lighting that lights up well against the drops whether I'm shooting objects or people.
customer_reviews.author: jakob

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment, bad case.
customer_reviews.text: The equipment itself is great. I'm very pleased, however, the zippers on both carrying cases broke the first time I zipped them back up. I would give five stars if this came with a better zipper. Now I need to find a separate case to carry all this equipment in.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Edited Review to 5 Star!
customer_reviews.text: If anyone has any issues please contact Neewer customer service directly and leave a message. The customer service is AWESOME! I was fortunate to speak with Mike. I had some bulb issues and he made sure to help fix my issue and more. Once again please contact Neewer first. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: H Park

customer_reviews.title: There's no catch - DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value! It came with so much I thought it was too good to be true but everything seemed to work exactly as it was supposed to. Great choice for someone who is maybe just starting out or a professional who can't afford really high-end equipment. I used it for my products on homehardwareplus.com and it worked wonderfully. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good!! Makes for any easy set up and take down. Looks professional. One problem are the light bulbs. They are a bit to white for what I needed but it was an easy fix. Back drops are a good quality and washable. You will need to steam them every time you hang them though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Everything is OK
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good... 2 of the bulbs were not working at first but the customer service is really helpful and I got the replacement in hand just within 3 days. Except that, everything was as described and I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the kit as I thought it might be a bit cheaply made at this budget price. The whole set works fine and not difficult to install or disassemble. All in all I am well impressed...
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with it all the way!!!
customer_reviews.text: worth every cent in my opinion. this bundle set comes with so much! everything you need for shooting professional style photos and videos in natural looking lighting. the soft boxes were the only tricky thing to put together but other than that everything else was a breeze to set up. the lighting is wonderful, the backdrops are crisp and clean and the green screen is effective in photoshop and OBS chromakey. the rodding on the stand for the sheets fit and connect so well together. This is a great set if you don't want to blow a ton of money and still want quality equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Truman

customer_reviews.title: It includes all that I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: All the soft lighting I want and could ever need! 4 lights in one set! i use one of each right now and they give me plenty of lighting for my space. the white and black backdrops go so well for taking pictures for work and are crisp and professional. protective and sturdy stand to hang them off of, easy enought to switch them out off the rail. very nice of them to include clamps, keeps them straight and on the line.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Affordable studio set up
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of pieces to it but it’s easy to set up. I like that it includes white, black, and my favorite the green screen because it’s easy to replace the background while editing. Lights are decent I wish they were a bit brighter and were dimmable. If you are a beginning photographer and wanting to get your foot into studio photography it’s worth it because of affordability.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Price, but Cheap Components Also; Non-Existent Instructions on Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner in studio photographer. After I finally put this system together, with limited instructions, I discovered there were no instructions on how to place the various components in a studio. Also, the light sockets are made of soft plastic with metal screws. One screw does not tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ringler

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This package is a complete studio for a bargain! I priced how much all this would be seperately and it was well over three times as much so you're definitely getting a good deal. The back drops came out wrinkly but that's to expected when they're folded, the creases came out easy with some steam so it's easy to fix. The stand was very easy to put together and hangs the backdrops well, they're pocket lined so I can insert it on the top rail but it came with clamps too that I can use to make sure they won't move around. Completely changed my lighting situation and it even came with all the bulbs needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Tang

customer_reviews.title: Well made but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems to be well made and work great unfortunately when I went to actually use it for the first time one the light bulbs didn't work and one of the clamps arrived broken. Initially I wasn't going to even take a star off about the clamp because I purchased extra but the kit arriving with a burnt out bulb is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: sammae

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I needed...
customer_reviews.text: The medium size is a good fit for me. If I went any bigger it would surpass my ceiling! The cross bar stand fit together entirely. It's pretty solid and sturdy with one of the backdrops on. They look great and clean and smooth on camera. Creases and bumps steam out easy. They look great with the lighting, since the umbrella and box lighting is so soft they don't overreflect or wash anything out.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Comes with absolutely everything you need to get you going. I can't recommend it enough to everyone who asks me what equipment I use, this brand is reliable and consistent with satisfactory results. The white, black, and green screen are well made, the material is nice and drapes well and gives me a sufficient amount of space to work with. The umbrella and soft boxes are uncomplicated to put together and come with brawny 7 foot tall stands. The backdrop frame works as a great support system, the clamps fit around the rod and tightly hold the cloths in place and don't leave imprints. Amazing starter kit for any budding photographer/videographer!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Pratt

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this light and background photography set It has ...
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this light and background photography set It has brought my photographing skills up a couple notches everything was exactly as described and the price was awesome compared to other products out there I havent used it on the go only in a small studio but has a great storage bag and it is all so light weight yet durable
customer_reviews.author: acsmith70

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! But bulbs not bright
customer_reviews.text: The kit is nice. Gives you that pro look when clients come in. Everyone is wowed by my gear which is awesome. I was disappointed that one of the bulbs was dead. Also with regards to the bulbs, they're not bright and I want to get brighter ones if possible. This pretty much gives you a fluorescent flat lighted look but I'm sure with gels and modifiers you can make the light look more creative
customer_reviews.author: kudzaidotnet

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: One of the cheapest and nicest kits I could find. Setting everything up took no time at all and the quality of each piece is great. The stands are pretty sturdy for how light they are and the soft boxes produce a lot of light. Tough and durable bag too that fits every last part inside without struggling to close it. Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Tilley

customer_reviews.title: I have used this to great success. The stand is good
customer_reviews.text: I found that this was a very complete set. In reading some reviews, it seems that people are confused about the light kits. I comes with everything you need and the picture is extremely accurate. The soft boxes have their own lighting element and the umbrellas utilize the light kits that are in the kit. I have used this to great success. The stand is good, but should not hold more than one or two backdrops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - I think they shipped me a return (Updated)
customer_reviews.text: Updated to a 5 star review. I never saw the comment from Neewer on this item so I never contacted them, just thinking there was nothing that could or would be done. Erin from Neewer actually found my email address, reached out, and shipped me everything that was missing. They went well above and beyond on this item and I couldn't be more pleased. I'm pretty disappointed in this purchase. the box looked like it was a return, it was missing the entire back drop frame, and 3 of the clamps. Everything else seemingly works.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Starks

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great kit for the money, can’t argue with that. I gave it 3 stars is because the material is just very cheap/fragile. I was setting up the stand for the backdrop and it snapped at the bottom. Other than that, it’s great. Hopefully they will send me another stand.
customer_reviews.author: EazyEli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Customer support has been awesome in taking care of any concerns that I had. They even went above and beyond to fix things when there was a problem. Overall the product seems to be pretty good. The set up is a little too big for my apartment unless I move all of my furniture. So make sure you have plenty of space when setting up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited with this set! Everything worked according to plan. Easy feats all the way. Such a great way to get a studio started. Comes with everything you need seriously to get you up and running. Lights, stands, and backdrops, and bags for travel and the clamps will really come in handy! I'm so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Furner

customer_reviews.title: This set works good for someone doing indoor photography for the first time
customer_reviews.text: This set works good for someone doing indoor photography for the first time. It IS cheap, but it gets the job done! You get what you pay for. Honestly, I feel like as long as you're not an extremely picky person then this set works just fine. However I do feel like it would be better if it came with more instructions. I figured it all out but to someone who knows nothing about setting these kind of things up they may have a hard time. (Picture posted of my first picture took with this set)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginner or backup set. Pretty decent quality equipment for the price. I'm by no means a professional photographer but it's a hobby/passion of mine. I wanted to try my hand at portrait photography and thought I could practice on my kids with this low-cost set up. Definitely worth the money. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: belinda klemm

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly as described in the description
customer_reviews.text: This lighting system is the best investment I made. My videos and pictures turn out looking great and I don't have those unwanted shadows in the background. The green screen is an easy setup, the clips are very helpful, and it works well for virtual meetings. The lighting equipment is also easy to assemble and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi H

customer_reviews.title: Hold on to your money and purchase this product in person
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products I have ever ordered from Amazon. It went from bad to worse. The box was supposed to have six clamps and only had five two of the tripods that I opened would damaged completely unusable I just want my money back I'm very amazed
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Abram

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Being an artist that is always on the go, sometimes I have an issue with bringing equiptment with me. I needed something that wasnt too expensive, but gets the job done. I found this kit online and for the price, the preformance is there. The lighting equiptment works great and I can work out of state without having to feel like I am losing out on the quality I would normally have in my studio. Very pleased with this set up. I can also bring it home with me so that next time I travel, this can come along as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Lozano

customer_reviews.title: You will break it if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap and a waste of time and money. Do not buy this. It will break.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: New fav!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as described and was very easy to put together. I give it 5 stars easy. The lighting from the soft boxes and umbrellas is very nicely diffused. The backdrops are thick are sewn well. The stand offers amazing support and can be adjusted. And the clamps give a firm grip and keep the backdrops from wrinking while they're hung. Pop style too since all the pieces are detachable and comes with bags to keep the stands and lights in. This will be very helpful when I go on my week long trips to make content with other people.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fully satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of Amazon is super quickly as usual and I received my package within 2 days. I was skeptical about the quality at first, but after I had my little 'studio' set up I was totally satisfied with the entire equipment. The backdrop is of great size for single portrait shooting, a little fold marks had to be ironed which was not a big problem, no bad-smelling at all. The lighting effect is natural and balanced. All the light stands as well as the backdrop support frame are solidly made and fully adjustable. I can not imagine a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua H. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but cheap products are naturally a riskier purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Most everything is what I expected. Very good for getting my studio started. Only complaint/unexpected quality problem is the main bag isn't sewn properly. The zipper track isn't attached properly and leaves a 2 inch hole in the the corner when "shut". Honestly though, if that's the worst of it (which it is), then I'm happy with it. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cleveland

product_meta.title: Neewer 2.6M x 3M/8.5ft x 10ft Background Support System and 800W 5500K Umbrellas Softbox Continuous Lighting Kit for Photo Studio Product,Portrait and Video Shoot Photography
product_meta.description:
Size:MediumDescription:

(4)79"(7 Feet)/200cm Light Stand

The light stand is constructed from aluminum alloy,giving it exceptional strength for heavy duty work.

For simple storage and transport,the stand collapses easily and is very lightweight to carry.

(2)Single Head Light Holder

Made of high impact plastic and aluminum.Support heavy weight and hold up against tough working conditions.

Insert fluorescent spiral bulb and umbrella and adjust your mount so it is at an optimum angle for getting great photographic results.

Lamp base:E27

(4)45W CFL Daylight Bulb

Color Temperature:5500K.

Regular screw base.

Style:Spiral

Input Voltage: 110-130V

(2)33"/84cm White Umbrella

Made of high quality nylon construction.Reflect and spread light stream evenly.

Material:nylon material,Aluminum shaft

(2)24"X24"/60x60cm Softbox

Adjustable lamp holder for different shooting angles.

A white front cover closes the front of the softbox,making varied lighting options quick and easy.

Extra long cords help you move them freely to position it for best lighting effects

Ultimate soften light stream and remove shadow to make perfect shooting

Color:Black/Silver

(1)1.8 x 2.8M/6 x 9 ft Musline Backdrop(Black,White and Green)+(6)Backdrop Clamps

Rod pocket on each top edge allows to be draped or hung.

Finished along all edges to prevent tears.

Single Piece Seamless Design

(1)2.6M x 3M/8.5ft x 10ft Background Support System

Made from aluminum alloy with a professional black satin finish.

Crossbar consists of four sections,making it simple to adjust the width.

It is comprised of two tripod stands and four cross bar sections and includes a heavy duty carry bag.

(1)Carry Bag for Background Support System+(1)Carry Bag for Continuous Lighting Kit

With carrying bag,custom designed for background support kit and photography accessories.
feature_bullets: The kit includes:(4)79"(7 Feet)/200cm Light Stand+(2)Single Head Light Holder+(4)45W CFL Daylight Bulb +(2)33"/84cm Umbrella+(2)24"x24"/60x60cm Softbox+(1)1.8 x 2.8M/6 x 9 ft Musline Backdrop(Black,White and Green)+(6)Backdrop Clamps+(1)2.6M x 3M/8.5ft x 10ft Background Stand Support System+(1)Carry Bag for Background Support System+(1)Carry bag for Continuous Lighting Kit.

(4)79"(7 Feet)/200cm Light Stand:Solid safety 3 legs stages,capable for stable,heavy duty work.And use quick single action locks,providing fast precision height adjustment.(2)The single head light holder allows you to attach a bulb to a light stand and add an umbrella.

(2)The 33"/84cm white translucent umbrella can soften,broaden and diffuse the light output of any tungsten or studio flash source.(4)45W day-light studio light bulbs:equals to 200W regular incandescent light bulb output.5500K fluorescent spiral bulb generates a close match to natural daylight and a crisper view of the items being illuminated.It is best for photography lighting.

(2)24"X24"/60x60cm Softbox:Softbox diffuses the light and gives you perfect even lighting when you need for the best shots possible.With E27 socket,you can directly connect light bulbs,fluorescent lamps,or slave flash to offer the light.

(1)1.8 x 2.8M/6 x 9 ft Musline Backdrop(Black,White and Green)+(6)Backdrop Clamps+(1)2.6M x 3M/8.5ft x 10ft Background Support System:The background kit is ideal for television,video production and digital photography.(1)Continuous lighting kit carry case+(1)Background support system carry bag:Great for transporting light stands,umbrellas,and other accessories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,195 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
